data.title: Dick Ebersol
data.meta_description: Dick Ebersol. Producer: Friday Night Videos. Dick Ebersol was born on 28 July 1947 in New York City, New York, USA. He is a producer and director, known for Friday Night Videos (1983), NBC Sunday Night Football (2006) and Beijing 2008: Games of the XXIX Olympiad (2008). He has been married to Susan Saint James since 21 November 1981. They have three children. He was previously married to Susan Stafford....
data.text: Dick Ebersol was born on July 28, 1947 in New York City, New York, USA. He is a producer and director, known for Friday Night Videos (1983), NBC Sunday Night Football (2006) and Beijing 2008: Games of the XXIX Olympiad (2008). He has been married to Susan Saint James since November 21, 1981. They have three children. He was previously married to Susan Stafford.
